item.title: The Philippines Cuts Off Access to Ten Overseas Cryptocurrency Exchanges
item.description: On August 6th, as per Decrypt's report, the Philippine Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) took action today by instructing major internet service providers to block access to ten overseas cryptocurrency exchanges, such as OKX, MEXC, Bybit, KuCoin, Bitget, Kraken, CoinEx, Phemex, BitMart, and Poloniex.Previously, the Philippine regulatory body had warned that cryptocurrency platforms were violating local regulations by providing services to Philippine residents without obtaining licenses and registrations. According to a new regulation that came into effect in June of this year, cryptocurrency service providers must register as local companies in the Philippines and hold a minimum paid-up capital of at least $1.8 billion.

item.title: Grayscale transfers 8062 ETH to Coinbase Prime, with a total value of approximately $29 million
item.description: On August 6th, according to Arkham Monitoring, 2 minutes ago, Grayscale transferred 8062 ETH to Coinbase Prime, with a total value of around $29 million.

item.title: U.S. publicly traded company Empery Digital increases its BTC holdings by acquiring an additional 88 BTC, surpassing a total holding of 4,000 BTC.
item.description: On August 6th, as per Businesswire, the US-listed company Empery Digital (formerly Volcon) augmented its holdings by 88 BTC. Currently, its total holding amounts to 4,000.85 BTC. The cost involved is approximately $470 million, and the average acquisition price per BTC is $117,552.

item.title: Federal Reserve's Kashkari: Two rate cuts this year still seems appropriate
item.description: August 6: Fed's Kashkari stated that the economy is decelerating and the Fed needs to respond to this economic slowdown. It may still be appropriate to adjust the policy rate in the short term. The answer regarding the inflation issue may take some time to become known, while the data on the economic slowdown is clear. Two rate cuts this year still seem to be appropriate. However, if inflation rises due to tariffs, the Fed may pause rate cuts or even raise rates. Adjusting the rate policy may be better than waiting. Unemployment rate data is of great importance, but the Fed is aware that this data may be revised. (FX168)

item.title: White House: Apple to Commit to $100 Billion U.S. Investment, Trump to Issue Statement
item.description: August 6th, in the White House, US: Apple (AAPL.O) is going to launch a new US manufacturing plan and enhance its US investment commitment by 100 billion dollars. President Trump will issue a statement regarding Apple today. (FX168)Previously, the White House announced that US President Trump will make a "statement" in the Oval Office at 4:30 pm Eastern Time on Wednesday (4:30 am Beijing Time the following day).

item.title: A Whale Acquires an Additional 1.6 Million Fartcoins
item.description: On August 6th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the whale "BH84Uo" withdrew 9,295 SOL from a centralized exchange (CEX) 30 minutes ago. The withdrawn amount was worth $1.53 million. Subsequently, it purchased 1.6 million Fartcoin.

item.title: The artificial intelligence native ERP platform Rillet has completed a $70 million Series B funding round, with a16z and ICONIQ co-leading the investment.
item.description: On August 6th, the native artificial intelligence ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) platform Rillet announced today that it has successfully completed a Series B financing round worth $70 million. This round was jointly led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) and ICONIQ, with participation from Sequoia Capital, Oak HC/FT, and other early investors.Andreessen Horowitz General Partner Alex Rampell and ICONIQ General Partner Seth Pierrepont will both join the board of directors.

item.title: The Trump Media & Technology Group has begun testing the Truth Social artificial intelligence search feature.
item.description: On August 6th, the Trump Media & Technology Group has initiated public testing of its novel artificial intelligence search function, "Truth Search AI", on the Truth Social platform.The Trump Media & Technology Group had previously announced on July 16th that it intended to incorporate the artificial intelligence feature into both the Truth Social iOS and Android applications as well as the web version.

item.title: US Stock Market Listed Company Actelis Announces Establishment of Cryptocurrency Treasury
item.description: On August 6th, Actelis Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ: ASNS) declared the formation of a cryptocurrency treasury. The board has given management the authorization to diversify the company's asset holdings by making selective investments in mature digital assets that fulfill specific criteria (such as being among the top 100 in terms of market capitalization, traded on major exchanges, and having a market capitalization of at least $5 billion).

item.title: Haslet: Trump's primary task is to maintain the Fed's independence, and his voting seems to carry a partisan color.
item.description: On August 6th, Larry Kudlow, who is the Director of the White House National Economic Council: The top priority of Trump is to keep the Federal Reserve independent. When referring to the Fed board, Kudlow stated that their votes seem to have a partisan nature. (FXStreet)
